sentences.sentence: It is one thing to speak much and another to speak pertinently.
sentences.translation: 说得多是一回事，讲得中肯又是一回事。

sentences.sentence: It tis one thing to speak much and another to speak pertinently.

sentences.sentence: More pertinently, Mr Rines was already primed to see something in the loch.
sentences.translation: 更确切的说，莱恩斯先生已准备在湖中发现点什么了。
